valerie.grossman@dal.frb.org
bradley.graves@dal.frb.org
kuhu.parasrampuria@dal.frb.org
HPI series for Belgium contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
HPI series for Germany is constructed using annual data. The values for 2014 represent an annual forecast that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
HPI series for Spain contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
HPI series for Ireland contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
HPI series for Italy contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
HPI series for Luxembourg contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
HPI series for Netherlands contains backcasted values for 1975Q1-1975Q4.
HPI series for New Zealand contains a forecasted value for 2014Q2 and 2014Q3.
HPI series for Slovenia contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
PDI series for Belgium is constructed using annual consumption of fixed capital data. The values for 2014 incorporate the forecasted annual value that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
PDI series for Switzerland is constructed using annual data. The values for 2013 & 2014 represent annual forecasts that have been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
PDI series for Denmark contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
PDI series for Spain contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
PDI series for Finland contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
PDI series for France incorporates a forecasted value for the consumption of fixed capital value in 2014Q3.
PDI series for U.K. incorporates a forecasted value for the consumption of fixed capital value in 2014Q3.
PDI series for Ireland contains a forecasted value for 2014Q2 and 2014Q3.
PDI series for Italy contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
PDI series for Japan contains forecasted values for 2014Q2 and 2014Q3.
PDI series for South Korea is constructed using annual data. The values for 2014 represent an annual forecast that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.

PDI series for Luxembourg is only available from 2006-2013. The remaining observations have been inferred partly with Belgian data. The series is constructed using annual data. The values for 2014 represent an annual forecast that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
PDI series for Netherlands contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
PDI series for Norway contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
PDI series for Sweden contains a forecasted value for 2014Q3.
PDI series for Croatia is constructed using annual data. The values for 2013 & 2014 represent annual forecasts that have been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
Forecasts used in HPI and PDI series are also used in their corresponding real counterparts (RHPI and RPDI).
